item.description:
Fellow Baby Boomers:

October 9th is John's Birthday and we will honor and celebrate his 71st.

Candy Leonard put together a  large research project on the Beatles and Beatle fans and will be presenting her research.

Here are the details: 

BEATLENESS: 
Lifelong Beatle fan and researcher Candy Leonard will present the findings of her research with first-generation Beatle fans. Drawing on sociology, cultural history, media studies, and developmental psychology, Leonard’s unique analysis of Beatlemania and its ongoing impact will engage and delight you. 

Sunday October 9th from 5 to 8 pm 
The Blacksmith House at the Cambridge Center for Adult Education 
56 Brattle Street 
Cambridge, MA 

The presentation will be followed by refreshments, music, and a celebration of John Lennon’s birthday. Feel free to bring wine and beer. 
Admission $5 

But first, let's meet at Fire and Ice.  The Sunday brunch goes until 3p - to get in on that deal, I've got the reservations for 2:45 and we can stay and enjoy good company and then cross the street to Brattle for the 5p presentation.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: John Lennon, Happy Birthday, We Love You
